title: A Foreign language
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Tom Daly, Wolf Koenig, Roman Kroitor and Stanley Jackson
brief_description: This film observes, in a Montreal public school, the teaching of English to immigrant children. To thousands of children arriving in Canada from Greece, Italy, France, Germany or Japan, English is “a foreign language.” Under able coaching they begin to understand and even enjoy the vagaries of the English language.
